description: Lamb adds a protein hit to this lime and chilli packed salad.
name: Asian Inspired Spicy Lamb Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together the ingredients for the dressing in a small bowl. Place the lamb steaks in a shallow dish, pour over half the dressing, cover and marinate for 30 minutes.
Slice the carrots and cucumber into thin ribbons with a vegetable peeler and finely slice the radishes. Add to a bowl with the watercress and toss with the remaining dressing to coat.

Heat a large griddle or frying pan on a medium high heat. Discard the marinade and add the lamb steaks to the pan. Cook for 3 minutes on each side for medium. Remove from the pan, wrap in foil and rest for 3 minutes.
Divide the salad between four bowls, top each with thinly sliced the lamb steaks and fresh coriander and serve.
